app-ssh.empty: This application has no instances available for SSH access
app-ssh.not-enabled: SSH is not enabled for this Application.
app-ssh.space-not-enabled: SSH Access is disallowed by the space '{{name}}'.
app-ssh.space-enable-prompt: A Space administrator will need to enable access for the space.
app-ssh.enable-prompt: You can enable and disable SSH access by using the 'Edit' link on the Summary tab.

quick-enable.quick-enable: You can also quickly enable SSH access by clicking the button below.
quick-enable.warning: NOTE: Enabling SSH access will restart ALL application instances.
